item.title: UBS Picks China Over Citadel Securities for Credit Suisse Unit
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS Group AG has entered final negotiations with a Beijing-backed fund over the sale of Credit Suisse’s money-losing China venture after talks with Citadel Securities LLC stalled, according to people familiar with the matter. UBS is now in exclusive talks with its Chinese partner, Bei...

item.title: ECB Case for Rate Caution Mounts After Fed Pares Back Easing Plans
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- European Central Bank officials just got another reason to hesitate over any further interest-rate cuts after the US Federal Reserve pared back its own plans for easing. With the so-called dot plots of officials in Washington now indicating only one reduction in 2024 instead of three ...

item.title: ECB’s Muller Says Inflation Could Temporarily Accelerate Again
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Euro-area inflation could quicken again and the European Central Bank has yet to reach its 2% goal, according to Governing Council member Madis Muller. “As we saw in the initial euro area inflation estimate in May, the pace of inflation may temporarily accelerate again,” he told Eston...

item.title: Vasle Says More 2024 ECB Cuts Probable in Baseline Scenario
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- More euro-area interest-rate reductions are likely if the European Central Bank’s expectations for a further slowdown in inflation materialize, according to Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle. “If the baseline scenario is realized and the data are favorable, then we can probably e...

Dazu musste sie eine hypothetische Betrachtung wählen. Denn die Klimabilanz von Gold hängt wesentlich von der Art der Gewinnung ab. Diese lässt sich be...
